description:
* Based on a spinoff manga by http://anidb.net/cr48094 [Kuori Chimaki].
The whole Sanctuary was misled into danger due to the civil war instigated by the Gemini Gold Saint, http://anidb.net/ch17681 [Saga]. The story begins right after the end of those events... This is a story of the girls protecting http://anidb.net/ch33224 [Athena]. These are the records of love and fierce fights they meet while opposing destiny on their way to maturity...
Source: M-U

REGULAR.description:
Shoko is a student at Ryuusei Private Academy Middle School. Her dear sister, Kyoko, had went to study abroad five years ago and hasn’t heard from her since. One day, an unknown entity suddenly attacks Shoko. The ones who attacked her had been the Dryads, underlings of the evil goddess, Eris, who was once sealed by Goddess Athena. When Shoko and Saori Kido awaiting the Galaxian Wars meet, the gears of destiny begin to turn!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaderi Kaçınılmaz Kardeşler‚ Shoko ve Kyoko
Les sœurs élues ! Shoko et Kyoko
Shukumei no Shimai! Shouko to Kyouko
The Fated Sisters! Shoko and Kyoko
الأخوات اللواتي كتب قدرهن شوكو وكيوكو
宿命の姉妹! 翔子と響子

REGULAR.description:
Shoko cannot hide the shock knowing Kyoko was taken away instead of her as the evil god’s host. As Shoko finds out the special position of Athena’s handmaidens as well as bodyguards that only women can fill, she decides to become a Saintia herself from her desire to become stronger in order to rescue her sister. Saori requests the Silver Saint, Pavo Mayura, for Shoko’s training, however…
On the other hand, Milo and Aiolia at the Sanctuary were sensing the evil Goddess Eris’ suspicious moves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bireysel Kararlar‚ Tanrıça ve Azize
Individual Decisions! The Goddess and Saintias
La volonté de la déesse et d`une Saintia
Sorezore no Ketsui! Megami to Saintia
قرارات فردية الالهة والقديسون
それぞれの決意! 女神と聖闘少女[セインティア]

REGULAR.description:
The underlings of the evil goddess, Malice Emony and Murder Phonos, plot to take Athena’s head to offer it to Eris and raids Saori. Mii stands up against Emony who continues to call Saori an “incomplete god”. Shoko’s Cosmo flare up during the training with Mayura. Sensing Athena’s danger from the Cloth’s box, can Shoko ultimately save Saori?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Blooming in Darkness! The Dryads of Eris
Karanlıkta Açan Çiçek‚ Orman Perisi Eris
Les dryades d`Éris, fleurs des Ténèbres
Yami ni Saku! Eris no Dryad-tachi
ازهار بين العتمة وايريس
闇に咲く! エリスの邪精霊[ドリアード]たち

REGULAR.description:
Shoko succeeded in entering Eris’ temple by chasing Phonos who fled battle. As she searches the temple to save her sister, Kyoko, she is informed of a shocking fact by Ate. When Ate’s vines catch Shoko off guard and begin to attack, a golden light enwraps her body! To bring back Shoko, Mii heads to Eris’ temple and reunites with her where they find Kyoko’s ragged body before their eyes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanashimi no Saikai! Hedatareta Shimai no Kizuna
Kederin Birleşmesi‚ Ayrı Düşmüş Kardeşlerin Bağı
The Reunion of Sorrow! The Bond of the Separated Sisters
Tristes retrouvailles ! Les liens des sœurs séparées
لم شمل مؤسف ورابطة الأخوات الممزقة
哀しみの再会! 隔たれた姉妹の絆

REGULAR.description:
Kyoko’s Cosmo disappeared in the battle at Eris’ temple. Saori’s heart wavers as she questions her existence from not being able to save Kyoko in defeating the evil god. However, with Saori inheriting Mitsumasa Kido’s will, the Galaxian Wars start without mercy. On the other hand, Shoko who was in the hospital had been depressed from Saori telling her goodbye, and she drops the pendant of Pegasus given to her by her sister. The boy who caught it for her was Pegasus Seiya who was entering the Galaxian Wars.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fly! Like Pegasus
Kanatlı At Gibi Uç
Tel Pégase, prends ton envol
Tobe! Pegasus no You ni
حلقي كما الحصان المجنح
翔べ! ペガサスのように

REGULAR.description:
Aphrodite of Pisces takes Athena to the Sanctuary by order of the Grand Master, where both will meet face to face. What secret does the Grand Master hide behind his tears? Meanwhile, Mayura has detected that the remains of Eris are producing an effect that could be catastrophic.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Colliding Souls! Saori vs. Grand Master
Deux âmes s`affrontent ! Saori contre le Grand Pope
Semegiau Tamashii! Saori vs. Kyoukou
Çarpışan Ruhlar‚ Saori Büyük Üstat’a Karşı
ارواح متحاضنة وساوري غي مواجهة السيد الأعظم
せめぎ合う魂! 沙織vs.教皇

REGULAR.description:
The moment the golden arrow strikes Saori, the Ghosts begin to stir. Shoko who was the evil god’s shell had lost conscious, having her soul pulled by the Ghosts. Mayura and the Saintias work hard to calm the evil spirits while Seiya and the Bronze Saints hurry through the Sanctuary to save Athena. Now, the deadly battle of the twelve temples begin...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Juunikyuu no Shitou! Osorubeki Jarei no Genwaku
Le combat à mort des douze maisons ! L`envoûtement des esprits maléfiques
On İki Tapınağın Savaşı‚ Korkunç Hayaletlerin Albenisi
The Battle of the Twelve Temples! The Allurement of the Terrifying Ghosts
معركة المعابد الاثنى عشر وإغراء الأشباح المرعبة
十二宮の死闘! 恐るべき邪霊の幻惑

REGULAR.description:
After the deadly battle, the Saints of the Sanctuary all swear their loyalty to Saori—Athena. Meanwhile, Eris, who was thought to have been sealed, had fused with her host, Kyoko, and multiplied her powers. Saori rises against Eris to protect Shoko, but receives the curse of the apple. The Gold Saints head to the Temple of Eris along with the Saintias to save Athena and to stop the evil god from scattering the Evil Seeds of war that fill people’s hearts with hate. That’s where Aiolia witnesses his own brother turning his fists against him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Clash of Nightmares! The Fists of Leo Flare Up
Akumu no Gekitotsu! Moeagaru Shishi no Ken
Kabusların Çarpışması‚ Aslan Öfkesinin Yumruğu
Le choc des cauchemars ! Le poing enflammé du lion
صراع الكوابيس وقبضة لوفلير
悪夢の激突! 燃えあがる獅子の拳

REGULAR.description:
Can you defeat your sister who has fused with the evil god? With Mu’s question, Shoko agonizes over the fate she bears. That’s when Orion Rigel, the Ghost of an ex-Silver Saint, stands before Shoko. From Rigel’s sad eyes that once shared a past with Kyoko during Saint years, Shoko senses his true feelings and... 
Mii vs. Emony, Aiolia vs. Saga, the individual battles within the Temple of Eris begins…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Spiral of Conflict! The Golden Apple and Orion`s Devotion
Arasoi no Uzu! Ougon no Ringo to Orion no Kenshin
Bir Anlaşmazlığın Sarmalı‚ Altın Elma İle Avcı’nın Fedakârlığı
Le maelström du conflit ! La pomme d`or et la dévotion d`Orion
ودامة وصراع، تفاني التفاحة الذهبية والإله أوريون
争いの渦! 黄金の林檎とオリオンの献身

REGULAR.description:
Finally, Shoko faces the evil god Eris. As Saori’s Cosmo grows weaker, all of the Saintias—Shoko, Mii, Xiaoling, Katya, and Erda—put their hearts together to challenge Eris. The Gold Saints continue to protect the Sanctuary as they find out Eris’ plan of crashing the temple into it. Aiolia and Milo, who face Saga in a deadly battle, plans to destroy the temple, however…  A raging destiny encircles the Saintias, Gold Saints, evil god Eris, and Saori Kido. The final battle begins
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brillez, jeunes filles ! Aux confins de la noble prière
Kagayake Shoujo-tachi yo! Kedakaki Inori no Hate ni
Shine Saintias! At the End of a Noble Prayer
تألق القديسيين في صلاة مشرفة
輝け少女たちよ! 気高き祈りの果てに
Opening
Ending 1a
Ending 1b
